title: J.B. Bickerstaff on the NBA Strike and Racial Justice | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC are joined by Cleveland Cavaliers head coach J.B. Bickerstaff to discuss the NBA players’ strike and how professional sports can lead the pursuit of racial justice for Black Americans.

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor

Guest: J.B. Bickerstaff
